A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I will not purchase a digital/physical copy of this crime against Star Wars. Rian Johnson should be prevented from having anything to do with this franchise.  There are not words to adequately describe how truly and completely awful the writing for this movie was - his 'vision' for this movie is more of a hellish nightmare for true Star Wars fans.  I had very high hopes that Disney would put their best foot forward with the franchise - with this installment they have fallen flat on their face.  I honestly didn't think it was possible to make a completely craptastic Star Wars movie\, Rian Johnson proved me wrong ... the Last Jedi was so bad that a cameo by Jar-Jar Binks would have made it better ... Rian Johnson should consider buying a chipper shredder and making his only possible positive contribution to the planet - as fertilizer.
